__e: Then we'll both close our doors.
I do, so if you wanna keep your eyes shut to the whole world...
But sometimes I need to keep my eyes closed you know, to stay in my own world.
When I was small, I liked to play walking with my eyes shut and I was never afraid because I always had someone near me.
And now we're closed, and much like my life, my day is over.
Is it all right if I watch you when you have your eyes shut and when you can't see me?
